description:
Welcome to the new official McDonald’s app.

The app is filled with great offers specially tailored to you. Deals and discounts appear regularly so check back often to see what’s new.

The news section keeps you up to date with everything that’s going on in McDonald’s near you. Look here for new games and competitions.

The nutrition section provides information on our entire menu. We provide allergy advice and nutritional information on everything from the Big Mac to a single dip!

Use our restaurant finder to find your nearest McDonald’s. Filter your search based on opening hours, facilities and get directions from wherever you are.

With the Pyszne.pl app, you can order whatever you love, wherever you are. With a wide variety of restaurants, supermarkets and convenience stores to choose from, you can enjoy everything from burgers, pizza, pasta, sushi, salads and loads more, and get it all delivered to your door.

Need some bits from the supermarket? Just open the app, choose ‘groceries’ and fill your basket. Whether it’s baby food, flowers, beer, wine, beauty products, ice cream, chocolate, milk, fruit and bread, our partners have it all.

How it works:
Ordering is easy. You can either pick a saved address, fill in your postcode/street name or let the app find your location automatically. You can then choose your favourite restaurant or store and select whatever you fancy. 

Follow your order to your doorstep:
Track your order from the kitchen or store straight to your doorstep with our Food Tracker®. We'll even send you push notifications to update you about the status of your order. It usually takes 30-45 minutes to deliver your food or groceries.

What you get with our app:
- Quick and hassle-free ordering
- Great offers and discounts
- Choose to pick up your order at the restaurant or store
- Re-order the same delicious meal with one tap of a button
- Browse grocery stores, cuisines, offers, best-rated restaurants, nearby spots and vegetarian/halal options
- Get regular updates on your order with our handy Food Tracker®
- Choose from multiple payment options

Order from big brands or local heroes. 
Pyszne.pl has it all!

Get food delivery to your doorstep from thousands of amazing local and national restaurants. Find the meal you crave and order food from restaurants easily with the Uber Eats app. Track your order in real-time.

FIND YOUR FAVOURITE FOOD & RESTAURANTS
Order food from nearby restaurants and search by cuisine, restaurant name, dish, and meal. 
Food delivery options for you to order and enjoy such as pizza, burritos, burgers, sushi, fish and chips, doughnuts and Chinese takeout.
Prefer pickup? Skip the line and reservations and choose to pick up your order instead. Choose your favourite delivery options with the Uber Eats app now.

SUBSCRIBE TO UBER ONE
For £5.99 per month, Uber One subscribers enjoy £0 delivery fee and up to 5% off orders over £15 at participating non-grocery stores (and 5% off orders over £25 at participating grocery stores) available on Uber Eats. Members are also eligible for rewards, perks, coupons, and offers. View full Uber One Terms & Conditions in app.

ORDER ALMOST ANYTHING, ANYTIME
Order household needs from your favourite pharmacies, supermarkets, and pet shops. Baby food or nappies, pharmacy needs, beauty products and cosmetics. Grocery staples like bread and milk, bananas and produce, flowers and plants, packaged foods or frozen treats. 

You can even order alcoholic drinks including beer, wine, spirits and cocktails.*

SIMPLE DELIVERY ORDERING
Pick your food order from any menu and add it to your cart with a few taps. That’s it.
Uber Eats makes it easy to order food delivery online or through the app and have it delivered by restaurants and delivery people near you.
Or, schedule your order in advance for a delivery person to pick it up later. Your choice!

ORDER FOOD AHEAD WITH PICKUP
Now you can also order food ahead for Pickup instead of just ordering delivery. Select Pickup, add food items to your cart, and skip the lines to the restaurant to get your food.

REAL-TIME ORDER TRACKING
Track your food delivery order on a map as it heads your way.
See the estimated arrival time at your address.
Get notified when your order arrives.

FIND SOME OF YOUR FAVOURITE NATIONAL RESTAURANTS
Some of our food delivery partners include: Pizza Hut, Domino’s Pizza, Burger King, Dunkin', KFC, McDonald's, Starbucks, Subway, Taco Bell,Costa Coffee, Kaspas, Gourmet Burger Kitchen, Franco Manca, Dixy Chicken, Chipotle, Chaiiwala, Amigos Burgers Shakes, Papa John’s, Krispy Kreme.  

FIND PHARMACIES, GROCERY STORES, AND MORE
Order from grocery stores such as Asda, Sainsbury Supermarket, Waitrose, The Co-op, Iceland, M&S Food, and Londis. You can also order from pharmacies such as Boots via Uber Eats, as well as from other delivery partners in the convenience and retail spaces.

ABOUT UBER EATS
Uber Eats is the way to order the food you love through an easy delivery experience. Uber Eats is available in hundreds of cities around the world. Enter your delivery address to explore restaurant and grocery delivery options near you.

AVAILABLE INTERNATIONALLY

Join others in your city who use the Uber Eats app to order from their favourite restaurants and schedule delivery.

Uber Eats is currently available in cities and metro areas including Adelaide, Amsterdam, Atlanta, Auckland, Austin, Baltimore, Brussels, Cape Town, Chicago, Dallas, Denver, Johannesburg, Glasgow, London, Los Angeles, Madrid, Melbourne, Mexico City, Miami, Milan, Nashville, New Orleans, New York, Ottawa, Paris, Philadelphia, San Diego, San Francisco, Seattle, Stockholm, Sydney, Taipei, Tokyo, Toronto, Warsaw, and Washington DC. Uber Eats helps you find food delivery around the world. Order delivery in countries around the world. See full list of available countries on our website. Uber content/messages human- or machine-translated as per device settings; accuracy not guaranteed

*Alcohol is only available in select markets. Must be at least 18 to purchase. Item availability varies by market. See the Uber Eats app for details.

app_name: Too Good To Go: End Food Waste
description:
Too Good To Go is your smart way to enjoy tasty food at great value, while doing good for the planet. Winner of the 2023 ‘Cultural Impact’ category at the prestigious Apple App Store Awards, the #1 app to reduce food waste helps you save delicious, unsold snacks, meals, and ingredients from local shops, cafés, supermarkets, restaurants, and top brands—all at great prices. 

In a world where 40% of food produced goes to waste each year, reducing food waste is the #1 action we can take to help tackle climate change. With Too Good To Go, you can unlock affordable meals and grocery items while helping to save the planet. Together, we have the power to make a real difference.



HOW TOO GOOD TO GO WORKS:

EXPLORE AND DISCOVER
Download the app to explore a map showing nearby restaurants, cafés, bakeries, supermarkets or trusted brands offering good food at a great price, ready to be rescued.

SAVE YOUR SURPRISE BAG OR TOO GOOD TO GO PARCEL
Browse a variety of Surprise Bags filled with tasty, unsold food—whether it’s sushi, pizza, burgers, or fresh fruits and veggies. Prefer to get your favourite food brands delivered to you? Save a Too Good To Go Parcel packed with good food from the brands you love, at great prices. 

AFFORDABLE EATS
Save a Surprise Bag or a Too Good To Go Parcel at ½ price or less. 

RESERVE YOUR SAVE
Confirm your purchase through the app to reserve your Surprise Bag and rescue these delicious meals from going to waste. By rescuing food, you save money and help fight food waste.

ENJOY
Collect your Surprise Bag at the scheduled time, or have your Too Good To Go Parcel delivered directly to you.


WHY TOO GOOD TO GO?:

WALLET-FRIENDLY INDULGENCE
Enjoy quality meals at affordable prices, satisfying both your taste buds and your wallet.

VARIETY AND CHOICE
Too Good To Go partners with a wide selection of local favourites and top brands, offering everything from sushi, pizza, baked and fresh goods to easy-to-store staple grocery items such as snacks, drinks, sweets or pasta.

ENVIRONMENTAL IMPACT
Each meal saved avoids CO2e emissions and the unnecessary use of water and land resources. By rescuing food from going to waste, you take a step towards a greener, cleaner planet. 

EASY PURCHASE PROCESS
The app’s simple and user-friendly interface makes it easy to browse, choose, and save Surprise Bags or Too Good To Go Parcels.

CONVENIENCE
Pick up your Surprise Bag at the designated time, or have a Too Good To Go Parcel delivered directly to you.

JOIN THE TOO GOOD TO GO COMMUNITY
Join the community of food lovers making a positive impact on the environment. Download the app now and start reducing food waste, bite by bite. 
Reducing food waste is a key action to help tackle climate change. For more information, visit tgtg.to/claims

It is always worth having KFC at your fingertips!

You can:
- Skip the line in restaurant  thanks to Mobile Order & Pay
- Order your favorite KFC Products with Home Delivery 
- Use special coupons, available only in the App
- Find the nearest restaurant

You can use the application in two modes
• Logged in - This means that you have access to all application functionality and you can make a payment. 
• Not logged in - This means that you can use the app, but you will not be able to finalize your order and make a payment

Downloading the application is free.

Important links:
•	Help:  https://kfc.pl/
•	Contact: https://kfc.pl/kontakt/
•	Privacy Policy:  https://kfcdostawa.pl/terms_of_use

The app uses anonymous information stored on your device for advertising and statistical purposes. If you do not agree, do not install the application. By installing our application you accept the policies described in our privacy policy.

Application require your phone number for sign in.

Enjoy your favorite restaurants and stores, all in one place.
The Wolt app makes it easy to discover and order (almost) anything from your city. From delicious food and fresh groceries to pharmacy and pet supplies. Search by category, cuisine, restaurant or item! You can easily browse popular restaurants including McDonald's, KFC, Domino's, Pizza Hut, Papa Johns, Burger King and many more. Enjoy food delivery of burgers, pizza, sushi and other delicious items. If you prefer, you can pick up your order from the restaurant or store!

Order (almost) anything, on-demand.
Need to stock up on groceries? Can’t make it to the city? Wolt has you covered with groceries and essentials at your fingertips. Browse through the categories on Wolt and order anything, from pharmacy items to pet supplies. Anything you need, we’ve got you covered with our 40 000+ restaurants and stores. 

Top offers, only on Wolt.
Discover great offers on food, groceries and more! Browse hand-picked deals in the Wolt app and enjoy great savings. There’s offers on everything from food and groceries to electronics and homewares. Find the freshest deals in the app, including up to 50% off your order and €0 delivery fees!


Subscribe to Wolt+
If you’re looking for even bigger savings, Wolt+ is our popular subscription service offering €0 delivery fees, plus much more. As a Wolt+ member, you’ll unlock unbeatable deals and exclusive perks.

Make every occasion special with Wolt
We’ve made it easy to order and enjoy whatever you need. Get gifts for your loved ones, schedule orders for groceries and food, and save with deals on clothing and more! Wolt has you covered with everything to make moments special. Browse the selection of lovely flowers, chocolates, baked treats and more – delivered to your door in one hour or less.

Double Order
Need to order groceries and dinner? Now you can! Combine two local venues in one order with the same delivery fee. Place a Double Order and enjoy more convenience, for less!

Track every step
With every order, you can enjoy real-time tracking, and a minute-by-minute countdown. Whether you keep an eye on the tracker, or have other things to do, we'll keep you notified, so you know when your order is about to arrive.

Customer support
If something doesn’t go as planned, we’re ready to help – with customer support available 24/7. Our friendly team is there to help the 25+ countries we operate in and are ready to respond in seconds.

Payment
We think ordering Wolt should be as simple as possible. That’s why you can pay conveniently and securely with your credit card or Apple Pay. Whatever works for you.

Life simplified. Joy delivered. 
Wolt is currently available in 170+ cities located in Azerbaijan, Croatia, Cyprus, Czechia, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, Georgia, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Israel, Japan, Kazakhstan, Latvia, Lithuania, Malta, Norway, Poland,  Serbia,  Slovakia, Slovenia, Sweden. More are added all the time! Download Now and Unlock Essentials at your fingertips.

Wolt is an Editors’ Choice! 
Recognized by Apple as a top-rated app, Wolt delivers more than just food. Enjoy a seamless experience, from browsing our curated selection of restaurants to tracking your order in real-time.

Craving something delicious? Whether it's pizza, tacos, or your favourite fast food from Burger King and KFC, Bolt Food delivers straight to your door.

WHY CHOOSE BOLT FOOD?
- Real-time tracking: track your order and courier’s location from the restaurant to your doorstep.
- Convenient scheduling: plan ahead and order food or groceries in advance.
- Pickup options: prefer to grab your meal yourself? Use our pickup feature for easy collections.
- Takeaway deals and discounts: save on your favourite meals and snacks.
- Seamless payments: pay effortlessly using Google Pay, Apple Pay, or credit/debit cards.

HOW TO GET STARTED:
1. Set your delivery address.
2. Browse and pick meals, groceries, or snacks from your favourite local restaurants or stores.
3. Place your food order and pay securely.
4. Track your order in real-time.
5. Sit back and enjoy!

DISCOVER LOCAL AND GLOBAL FAVOURITES:
Explore a culinary world at your fingertips with Bolt Food. From beloved local restaurants to renowned fast food chains like McDonald's, get meals from your favourite restaurants delivered to your door.

*BOLT MARKET - QUICK GROCERY DELIVERY:
Need groceries or essentials delivered? Bolt Market brings everyday items like milk, bread, and coffee, as well as speciality products like pet supplies, cosmetics, or alcohol, right to your doorstep. Forget the long supermarket queues and shop smarter with Bolt Market.

*BOLT PLUS
With Bolt Plus, you can access exclusive benefits that save you time and money. For example, you can enjoy priority delivery for your orders, even during the busiest hours.

*GO OUT AND SAVE WITH DINEOUT
As convenient as it is to get food delivered to your door, some moments are worth making the trip out for. Find tables at nearby DineOut restaurants and get a discount off your meal. Just open the app, search for what you crave, and switch to the DineOut tab for in-restaurant offers. 

Bolt Food was created by the European super-app Bolt. It’s challenging the efficiency of the food and grocery delivery industry while helping restaurants and stores get more orders and enabling couriers to earn money.

Become a Bolt Food Courier partner:
Have a car, bike, or motorbike? Earn money delivering meals with Bolt Food: https://bolt.eu/en/food/courier/.

Partner with Bolt Food:
Are you a restaurant or grocery store? Boost your sales by joining Bolt Food: https://bolt.eu/en/food/partner/.

Get in touch with us via food@bolt.eu

Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/boltfood.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
*Only available in selected markets.

Zamów wygodnie zakupy z dostawą w aplikacji Żabka Jush!
Szybkie zakupy z ekspresową dostawą nawet w 15 minut w Żabce Jush!
Duże zakupy bez dźwigania w delio supermarket online – dostawa na wybraną godzinę.
Tysiące butelek do wyboru z dostawą na terenie całej Polski! Nawet w 24h z Alcostore.pl.

Dzięki aplikacji masz dostęp do szerokiego wyboru produktów spożywczych, kosmetyków, chemii gospodarczej, oraz innych akcesoriów, które możesz zamówić na trzy wygodne sposoby – ekspresowo w Jush, planując dostawę w delio supermarket, albo wybierając z selekcji wyjątkowych butelek w Alcostore.

Jak działa aplikacja Żabka Jush?
1. Ekspresowe zakupy spożywcze z Jush
Potrzebujesz szybkich zakupów, które dotrą do Ciebie błyskawicznie? W aplikacji możesz zamówić wszystko, co potrzebujesz, a dostawa trafi do Ciebie nawet w 15 minut. To idealne rozwiązanie, gdy:
- Nie masz czasu na wyjście do sklepu, a potrzebujesz czegoś na już
- Skończyły Ci się podstawowe produkty spożywcze, takie jak chleb, mleko czy warzywa
- Chcesz kupić kosmetyki, chemię gospodarczą lub inne akcesoria bez wizyty w sklepie

2. Duże zakupy spożywcze z delio supermarket
Planujesz większe zakupy? Potrzebujesz szerokiego wyboru produktów w atrakcyjnych cenach? W delio supermarket możesz zamówić duże zakupy online z dostawą w godzinnym okienku dostawy - dotrą do Ciebie nawet w godzinę! Dzięki temu nie musisz martwić się o transport ciężkich toreb czy o stanie w kolejkach.

W delio znajdziesz:
- Produkty spożywcze najwyższej jakości – od świeżych warzyw i owoców, przez nabiał, aż po mrożonki
- Kosmetyki i chemię gospodarczą, które ułatwią Ci codzienną pielęgnację i utrzymanie czystości
- Szeroki wybór artykułów spożywczych i przemysłowych, dzięki którym zrobisz kompleksowe zakupy w jednym miejscu
Dzięki temu możesz łatwo połączyć codzienne zakupy spożywcze z tymi większymi.

3. Szeroki wybór butelek z wygodną dostawą w Alcostore!
Kupuj wygodnie – bezpiecznie dowieziemy wybrane przez Ciebie produkty premium prosto do domu. Wybieraj spośród tysięcy artykułów z całego świata – od wyselekcjonowanych napojów, przez rzemieślnicze specjały, po wiele, wiele innych. Nic nie musisz robić - poczekaj tylko na kuriera.

Dlaczego warto korzystać z aplikacji Żabka Jush?

- Trzy sposoby robienia zakupów – ekspresowe zakupy online, większe zakupy z dostawą na wybraną godzinę lub dostawa butelek nawet na następny dzień
- Bez wychodzenia z domu – zamawiaj wygodnie i oszczędzaj czas
- Szeroki wybór produktów – od podstawowych artykułów spożywczych po kosmetyki, akcesoria do domu, oraz wyjątkowa selekcja butelek
- Atrakcyjne ceny i promocje – korzystaj z wyjątkowych ofert i kodów rabatowych
- Bezpieczne płatności online – płać szybko i wygodnie w aplikacji

Gdzie działa Żabka Jush?

Jush oraz delio supermarket aktualnie obsługujemy w Warszawie i Krakowie, ale niebawem pojawimy się w kolejnych miastach. Alcostore dostępny jest na terenie całej Polski.

Pobierz aplikację Żabka Jush już teraz, wybierz rodzaj zakupów, jakich akurat potrzebujesz, i zamawiaj produkty spożywcze, kosmetyki, chemię, inne artykuły, oraz wyjątkowe butelki prosto do domu!

Więcej informacji znajdziesz na www.delio.com.pl oraz w aplikacji Żabka Jush.

The Official Thermomix® Cookidoo® App gives you access to the growing universe of mouth-watering Thermomix® Guided Cooking recipes. You pick and choose which recipes go with you wherever you are. Create an account and get cooking!


SMART @ HEART
Connect to Cookidoo® and access over 100,000 worldwide recipes directly from your app and through the screen of the Thermomix® TM6. Also, be sure to check out the exclusive step-by-step photos and videos, making cooking easier than ever.


YOUR THERMOMIX® COOKIDOO® ACCOUNT
To use the app, you need to have your Thermomix® Cookidoo® username and password. Your local Thermomix® Cookidoo® website will tell you how to create your account for the app.


GET INSPIRED
Wondering what to cook today? Discover hundreds of ideas for every taste, season and occasion! With Cookidoo® membership, you get instant access to every recipe on Cookidoo®. Everything’s on the menu! Our recipe suggestions and articles will point you in the right direction.
 
 
CREATED RECIPES
Discover our newest Cookidoo® feature! You can create, import and modify your favourite recipes, save them all in one place and cook them with your Thermomix®. Your Thermomix®, your way.


PLAN AND COOK
Planning is easy and fun, add recipes to your planner and find the recipes ready for cooking when you need them. The Cook Today button on each recipe lets you schedule a recipe with a single click.


MAKE IT YOUR OWN
Create your own recipe lists to manage your recipes the way you want. Bookmark any recipe you find appealing so you can find it later. You can also view recipes you scheduled in the past.
 
 
COOK-KEY® BRINGS GUIDED COOKING TO YOUR FINGER TIPS
Cook-Key® connects your Thermomix® TM5 to Cookidoo®. Enjoy sending your recipe favourites, weekly plan and recipe collections from the iOS App to your Thermomix®.


Terms of Use:
https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

Unlock your home's full potential with HomeID.


HomeID, formerly NutriU, is your all-in-one app for meal planning and prep, with a variety of healthy and delicious recipes to explore. It's your companion for delicious Airfryer recipes and meals - from breakfast to dinner, healthy snacks, and delightful coffee breaks. Collaborating with home cooks, professional chefs, baristas, and Philips Kitchen Appliances, HomeID elevates daily routines into enjoyable experiences with:
• A vast array of easy recipes for every meal and occasion, including snacks, main courses, desserts, brunches, hot drinks, and more. Explore a world of homemade culinary delights.
• Detailed nutritional information for each recipe, empowering you to make informed choices for yourself and your loved ones.
• Diverse culinary options catering to all preferences, such as pasta, casseroles, chicken dishes, cheesecakes, and an extensive selection of vegan and vegetarian choices.
• Instructional videos, expert advice, and integrated features for Philips kitchen appliances, covering Airfryers, coffee/espresso machines, pasta makers, blenders, juicers, Air Steam Cookers, and All-in-One Cookers.
• Tips for crafting the perfect espresso or a simple caramel latte, bringing barista-level coffee into your home.
• A community dedicated to finding joy in the small things amid busy schedules.
• Plus, you can now purchase home appliances directly from your HomeID app.


HomeID - Your Comprehensive Home Appliance App.
Maximize your capabilities with HomeID. Suitable for new appliance owners and seasoned users, HomeID unveils the full potential of your home.
Embrace simplicity in your daily life. Join us at HomeID.

Save delicious food. Save money. Discover new favorites.
Foodsi is the app that gives food (and more!) a second chance. Think of it as a package of possibilities for anyone who wants to shop smart, eat tasty food, and protect the planet — stress-free. No pressure, no waste. Just save a box, pay less, and feel good.

Your way, your savings
Pick up a surprise food box while walking the dog. Grab a catering package on your lunch break. Order a fresh boxed diet with free delivery to your door. Foodsi (not Foodsy!) is the easiest, tastiest way to fight food waste and save the planet.

A package equals more than just food
Every Foodsi package means delicious food at up to 70% off. From bakeries, restaurants, cafés, stores, supermarkets, and drugstores to fresh flowers, cosmetics, plants, and pet supplies. Surprise boxes, catering boxes, short-dated products… all in one app.

Fresh catering made simple
Looking for catering without long-term commitments? Foodsi offers dozens of one-day boxed diets — vegan, vegetarian, keto, traditional, even pet diets. Always fresh, always cheaper, always with free delivery.

How it works:
1. Discover – Open the map and see what you can save nearby: a sushi box, a pizza, or a fresh bakery package waiting for pickup.
2. Choose – Pick a package or box — always cheaper, always delicious.
3. Pay – A few clicks and your food box is secured.
4. Collect or get delivery – Pick it up in person, receive it by courier, or collect it from a parcel locker.


Why save food with Foodsi?
- Delicious & cheaper – Get food packages up to 70% cheaper.
- Variety – Restaurants, bakeries, pastry shops, catering services, supermarkets, flowers, cosmetics, pet food — all in one place.
- Less waste – Every saved package means less CO₂, less waste, and more good food on plates.
- 2M+ savers – Join a community that rescues food with appetite and impact.

---------------
For businesses
Have surplus food or products? If you run a restaurant, shop, drugstore, catering service, or flower shop, list your package in the app. Earn money, reduce waste, and boost your image — eco, profitable, and smart.

Foodsi = less waste, more taste, and great deals.
Download Foodsi today — save food, grab packages, and enjoy delicious food for less.

Download the Burger King® app and enjoy royal food at exceptional prices! 


Royal Coupons



Discover the diversity of our menu and choose from the available offers that pozwolą allow you to satisfy your hunger without burdening your wallet. New coupons appear regularly, don't miss out on the best bargains!


Check out our menu 


Do you love our burgers? Now you can have our menu in your pocket! 


Restaurant information


Check out information about your nearest Burger King restaurant and opening hours!

Czołem, PasiBrzuchu! 

Szukasz całkiem nowych kuponów, bonusów i nieskończonych możliwości? Bardzo dobrze trafiłeś. Z tą apką złapiesz okazje, które nie będą dostępne nigdzie indziej! Ale to nie wszystko, czytaj dalej. 

Twoja apka zmieni się w koster
Zamów Pasi Ucztę na kiosku, zeskanuj dedykowany kod QR, a apka da Ci znać, kiedy jedzonko będzie gotowe! Dzięki temu nie musisz czekać na swój numerek, możesz wygodnie rozsiąść się i czekać na powiadomienie o zamówieniu. 

Bonusowe kupony i specjalne nagrody tylko a APLIKACJI!
Przeglądaj kupony wygodnie w aplikacji. Tylko tutaj znajdziesz bonusowe zniżki, których nie ma nigdzie indziej! Kupony czasowe, turbo promki i mega zniżki? Tylko z Pasi Apką!

Realizuj specjalne promo kody
Miej oczy szeroko otwarte. Promo kody mogą być wszędzie! Co się z nimi kryje? Przekozackie promki! Szukaj promo kodów na mieście i w sieci, zgarniaj nagrody w Pasi Apce. 

Co jeszcze? 
gorące newsy od PasiZiomków? Znajdziesz je w apce!
zastanawiasz gdzie jest Twoja najbliższa restauracja? Sprawdzisz to w aplikacji. 

PS: Chcecie wiedzieć więcej? Miejcie oko na to, co dzieje się w naszych lokalach i socjalach. Do zoba!

THE APPLICATION WORKS ONLY IN THE POLISH LANGUAGE VERSION 
THE APPLICATION WORKS ONLY IN POLISH CARREFOUR STORES.                                                                                               

Coupons with discounts up to - 50%! You have all the benefits in your pocket!

Download the MÓJ Carrefour app, register and activate your coupons! Take advantage of discounts up to - 50% and always be up to date with the offer and promotions:
• 10% discount on your purchases every weekend!
• 10% discount coupon for Carrefour Bio products!  
• new discount coupons for a while 
• At present newspapers and promotional campaigns
• em sticker

Do you care about quick shopping, which you will pack immediately from the shelf are bags? Or do you value the possibility of greater control over expenses? Scan&Go service meets your expectations! Less time spent at the checkout, no need to unpack all purchases and the choice of payment options are its strengths!

Thanks to Mój Carrefour you can additionally:
• Mobile and Senior Card on your phone, always with you
• To see how much a product costs in the store thanks to the Price Reader
• Do shopping online - grocery shopping without queues and with a convenient form of delivery
• Make a map of Carrefour shops with the possibility to choose your favorite shops

Please be advised that the application "My Carrefour" uses cookies that are subject to installation on the user's device after turning on the application - regardless of registration in the application. Information on the types of cookies used by Carrefour Polska, the purpose and method of processing cookie data and the possibility of managing cookies by the user is available in the Privacy Policy posted on the website: https://www.carrefour.pl/polityka-prywatnosci/.

Food Farmer umożliwia szybkie znalezienie lokalnych produktów rolnych, dzięki czemu możesz cieszyć się świeżymi i zdrowymi produktami prosto z Twojej okolicy. Dzięki intuicyjnemu interfejsowi użytkownika oraz zaawansowanym funkcjom wyszukiwania, nasza aplikacja zapewnia łatwy dostęp do świeżych warzyw, owoców, mięsa i innych produktów prosto od producentów rolnych z Twojej okolicy.

Popeyes in the city!
Ściągaj aplikację Popeyes® i ciesz się smakiem chrupiącego i soczystego kurczaka prosto z Nowego Orleanu. Na co masz dzisiaj ochotę? Sprawdź menu ze szczyptą Luizjańskiego smaku przyprawy Cajun!
 Zamawiaj i odbieraj na miejscu
Omiń kolejkę i zamów swoje jedzenie szybciej dzięki aplikacji Popeyes® Chicken Sandwich już na Ciebie czeka! Y’all ready?
Znajdź restaurację w pobliżu
Nie wiesz, gdzie znajduje się najbliższa restauracja Popeyes? Użyj lokalizatora restauracji i znajdź miejsce najbliżej Ciebie. Do zoba!
ENG:
Popeyes in the city!
Download the Popeyes® app and enjoy the crispy, juicy flavor of chicken straight from New Orleans. What are you craving today? Check out our menu with a dash of Louisiana Cajun spice!
Order ahead and pick up in-store
Skip the line and get your meal faster with the Popeyes® app. The Chicken Sandwich is waiting for you! Y’all ready?
Find a nearby restaurant
Not sure where the nearest Popeyes is? Use our restaurant locator and find one close to you. See y’all soon!
:white_check_mark:
1

Order pizza from Pizza Hut in an easy and simple way through the mobile application!

Are you hungry and want something delicious? Our mobile app is perfect for you. Download and order now for delivery or takeaway. Just a few simple steps to order your favorite pizza.

How it's working?

1. Enter a delivery address or locate yourself.

2. Choose your favorite pizza. How about a pan dough or hot cheese in the crust?

3. Pay as you want. By cash or card on delivery or by online transfer.

Your pizza will be at your place in 30 minutes or you can pick it up at the restaurant in 10!

With the Pizza Hut app, you can not only order pizza with delivery or takeaway, but you will gain much more.

Find all the best deals in one place.

You will be up to date with all the news. Be the first to know about the start of the Pizza Festival!

Do you want to go to Pizza Hut with your family or friends, but you don't know where to find us?

In the application you can easily find the nearest restaurant and its opening hours.

Download the Pizza Hut app and your favorite pizza will always be at your fingertips.

Order for delivery or takeaway.

Enjoy your meal!

Love coffee? Then you’re in the right place. The Costa Coffee app makes being a coffee fan so much easier and more rewarding. It’s the simplest way to collect Costa Club beans, order your favourite drink for collection in store, find your nearest Costa, view your beans balance and exchange beans for free treats. Yum!

All of your Costa Club details are in the palm of your hand, so there’s no need to carry your loyalty card. Just scan your phone at the till whenever you make a purchase, or scan the code from Costa Express machines whilst your drink is being made. You can even order your favourite drink from a Costa Express machine, all from the app!

With our app, you can:

• Log in with your current Costa Club account details, register an existing card or set up a new account (and get a new member bonus of 1 bean!)
• Use mobile ordering to order ahead and skip the queue in store
• You can now use your free drink rewards on Collect orders
• One touch contactless reordering from a Costa Express machine
• Treat a friend by gifting them a reward
• Track your beans balance to see when you have enough for a free handcrafted drink
• Find details of your nearest Costa stores including directions, opening times and facilities
• Ditch the card and keep Costa Club in your pocket at all times
• Add your Costa Club card to your Apple Wallet

We pass your Costa Club ID internally within our systems to deliver more relevant and personalised content and rewards in the future.You can contact Customer Services to opt out of the profiling of your personal data.

Already using the app? We’d love to hear your ideas for how we might make it better. Let us know at https://www.costa.co.uk/contact

Unfortunately, the Costa Coffee app is not currently available for use in Northern Ireland.

The official McDonald’s iPhone app!

Coupons, restaurants and your favorite products in a new design. Download our new app today:

- Current promotional products* and all our classics
- Coupons* for direct redemption at the restaurant, simply scan them at the counter
- Product finder with nutritional info
- Restaurant finder with opening hours, services and directions
- Mobile Order & Pay**


* Only at participating restaurants in Germany and Luxembourg.
** Mobile ordering and payment is currently only available in some restaurants. A list of participating restaurants can be found in the app. Mobile payment requires a valid VISA or Master Card credit card. The order function is only active if you are near a participating restaurant.

developer: Lidl Digital International GmbH & Co. KG
description:
Your cooking upgrade! Discover your Monsieur Cuisine’s full potential with the Monsieur Cuisine App, and experience the whole world of smart cooking – with exclusive benefits, countless recipes, useful tips and tricks, a friendly community and lots of additional functions for an even better cooking experience. Simply sign up for free and get started! 

RECIPES FOR EVERY TASTE
Browse, select and view directly on your Monsieur Cuisine – in our extensive recipe database, you can find over 1000 recipes for every day. All of our recipes have been prepared in our test kitchen – for guaranteed success. 

STEP BY STEP TO THE PERFECT DISH
Whether you are already an expert or you’re all thumbs in the kitchen – with this powerful all-rounder at your side and our helpful step-by-step instructions, we guarantee you will be able to make the fluffiest cakes, the creamiest risottos and much more right from the start.  

WEEKLY PLANNING AND SHOPPING MADE EASY 
Never run out of ideas: let our recipe database inspire you – and as you browse, simply enter your selected recipes into your calendar to give you a perfect overview of your week. With just a few clicks, you can save all the ingredients for your planned recipes directly onto your shopping list. It couldn’t be simpler. 

SAVE YOUR FAVOURITE RECIPES 
To help you find your culinary highlights and favourite dishes quickly and easily, you can tag them and save them on your individual favourites list for easier access. You can also find recently prepared dishes in your cooking history. 

WE WANT YOUR OPINION 
Over 1000 recipes – that means you have a choice of over 1000 dishes. To make your decisions easier, we not only test all the recipes ourselves, but they are also continually reviewed by our users. And we want your opinion, too! As part of our community, you can rate recipes after preparing them and actively help shape our selection. 

INDIVIDUAL NOTES 
Do you like to improvise when you cook? But do you often forget your brilliant ideas the next time you make something? Or do you simply like to add a personal touch to your recipes? No problem. Save your individual notes at each recipe step, and you’ll never lose anything again. 

SAVE AND SHARE YOUR OWN RECIPES 
Do you want to try out your grandmother’s world-famous apple cake recipe in your Monsieur Cuisine? With the Monsieur Cuisine App, you can create your own recipes and if you wish, share them with the community. 

YOUR ACCESS
To access the Monsieur Cuisine App, you will first need a My Lidl account. Follow the instructions on your device or on the website to register, and log in to the App using your user name and password. Now you’re ready to go!

Ordering Domino's pizza has never been so convenient as with our app! The newest version offers a number of improvements. Now you can: 
 
place an order with home delivery or with personal collection at the selected restaurant,
enjoy the special discounts we have prepared for you 
choose payment method - cash, payment card or convenient online payment with PayU and BLIK
with user's account, you gain access to history of your orders and can mark products as favorites
you can subscribe to our newsletter and receive exceptional offers and promotional codes
you will receive push notifications, informing you of the best promotions.

You do not need to set up an account in our application - you can always profit from the exceptional promotions. You can order your favorite pizza even up to 50% cheaper, both with home delivery and with personal collection. At Domino's, we believe that good food is an element of good life!

The Starbucks App is a convenient way to pay in store with your phone. Rewards are just at your fingertips! You’ll collect Stars and start earning free drinks and food with every purchase. 

Join Starbucks Rewards 
Register your Starbucks Card in the app and start collecting Stars today  – delicious rewards and special offers are waiting!

Add money to your Starbucks Card
Reload your Starbucks Card with a few clicks by your credit card or bank transfer.
 
Pay by phone  
Save time and earn Stars by paying with the Starbucks app. Enjoy your favorite drinks and food even if you forgot your wallet. 

Get rewards
Track your Stars and redeem rewards for a free drink of your choice in Starbucks.

Enjoy special offers
Be the first to know and receive unique offers as a Starbucks Rewards member! 

Find a store  
See stores near you, get directions and check opening hours whenever you want to taste something delicious. 

Manage your account 
Check your Starbucks Card balance, view past purchases, see your status in the program and choose your favorite Card design.

With the MAX app you can order and pay for your food with your mobile phone. 

Locate Max restaurants, customise burgers and save orders as favourites. 

All food is made-to-order. When your order is completed, the order number will turn green in the app and on the order ready board in the restaurant. Simply show your order number to the staff when collecting the order.

Being a loyal customer and getting rewarded has never been easier! 

Join hundreds of thousands of users and make your loyalty count! Collect digital stamps at your favourite specialty coffee shops, bakeries, restaurants, and other businesses in your area – all available in one simple app, which acts like a wallet for your digital loyalty cards.

The more you visit, the more rewards you will unlock. Having Embargo App on your phone means:

- You will never lose your stamp cards again 
- You will save paper and do your bit to keep our planet green 
- You will enjoy countless rewards for being loyal

Tap. Eat. Drink. Repeat.

It's as easy as that! 

#WeMakeLoyaltyCount

Aplikacja mobilna Kuchni Vikinga to wygodne narzędzie do składania nowych zamówień oraz obsługi bieżących. 

• wybieraj wygodnie spośród 40 posiłków każdego dnia
• oceniaj posiłki, zdobywaj punkty i wymieniaj je na pyszne dodatki 
• zmieniaj adres dostawy, przesuwaj dni w kalendarzu 

Po prostu rób to co lubisz. Myślenie co na obiad, robienie zakupów i gotowanie zostaw Vikingowi!
